sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Not long afterwards, Will found himself in front of his apartment. Apartment number 409.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: His hands are shaking as it is nearing the door handle. Will takes a deep breath, he is readying himself to open his apartment.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Before he can do that though, he is interrupted by the newly moved couple.

sentences.name: NeighborHusband
sentences.sentence: Oh hello there, you must be room 409 occupant.

sentences.name: NeighborWife
sentences.sentence: Hello, we just moved into room 410. We have a gift for you guys, I heard from our other neighbor that you are living with your wife right?

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will frowns when he hears that. He hates it when someone reminds him of Anna. Even though his neighbor means no harm, his face shows that he is not happy at all.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: He just wants to quickly get into his room and sleep.

sentences.name: Will
sentences.sentence: Thanks, i’m tired right now so goodbye

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Will takes the gift and goes inside his apartment.

sentences.name: NeighborWife
sentences.sentence: Hope we did not bother him, he seems to be going through something rough . . .
